name: Square Cosine
description:
This is a game made for the Brackeys Game Jam (2022.1)

Square Cosine is a game that is very similiar to Just Shapes And Beats, but this game has some really cool looking maps, all made with the help of maths!

 (The game was designed to be really hard btw)

But wait... All of this is happening inside of a cat's head???
